entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 16 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 16 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
